header.title: The best Fence installation company in Suisun City
bullets: FREE custom 3D Fence quotes that you can design, review and edit online!
Responsive, quick and friendly customer service from end-to-end!
Transparent pricing and our quality assurance.
Beautiful, high-quality Fences for your property built by skilled local craftsmen.

Yelp.description: It was Mark who responded to my query about fence installation from this company. He is easy to talked with and has given me enough information from the very start. Emailed me detailed information with pictures of the works they have done. I have chosen this company to do my fence project because of Mark's good accommodation. Thanks Mark, you are an asset to the company. The project manager Eliana took good care of the pushing through of the project and really appreciate her. Thanks to you guys! Thumbs up!
Yelp.name: Victoria D.
Yelp.title: Easy to talked with, emailed me detailed information with pictures of the works they have done.

Google.description: We got several bids for our redwood gate. Ergeon not only had the best price and fastest timeline, but our rep Socrates was exceptionally professional, kind and helpful. The estimate process was fast and easy, done via video conference! Cant wait to see the end result!
Google.name: Giovanna L.
Google.title: Ergeon not only had the best price and fastest timeline, but our rep was exceptionally professional, kind and helpful.

articles.description: If you’re looking to get a new fence in California, it’s important to know about the laws surrounding fences and home improvement projects. Our post will go over some important things to keep in mind.

When it’s time to get a new fence it’s important to always use a reputable, licensed, and insured contractor. Some people try to cut costs by using unlicensed contractors, but this can end up being a major issue if any problems happen during the installation or down the line. In this post, we’ll go over the main reasons why you should always use a licensed and insured fence contractor.

There’s a lot to consider when weighing the pros and cons of a wood fence versus a chain link fence. We’ve tried to make the process easier for you by diving deeper into some of the areas of consideration.
